definition: see 網絡水軍|网络水军[Wang3 luo4 shui3 jun1]
net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
fifty cents party (person supposed to relay government propaganda on Internet sites)
to obscure the facts (idiom); to mislead the public with prevarication and deliberate falsehoods
(neologism) person who posts online in support of the Chinese government, but unlike a wumao 五毛[wu3 mao2], is not paid for doing so (abbr. for 自帶乾糧的五毛|自带干粮的五毛[zi4 dai4 gan1 liang2 de5 wu3 mao2])
to discredit/to defame/to smear sb's name/to bring shame upon (oneself or one's family etc)/to blacken (e.g. commando's face for camouflage)/to black out or obliterate (e.g. censored words)
to start rumours and create trouble
